page.title: 17A LITTLEPORT SATURDAY
page.content:
This is how Susan Mann, aged 12, described a day in her life.
"On Saturdays, I usually go over to Tescoes in Ely with my mum by car. When I get back I put my pony,{Kojak,} on the river bank to eat grass, while I help my mum tidy the house. We have dinner and then I put on my jodhpurs and boots for riding. I pick up the lead rein and get Kojak off the bank, groom him and tack him up. I take him riding, calling on one of my friends, who comes with us for a couple of hours. When I get back, I feed Kojack and do my homework."
